name: Pyfader
tagline: A simple pygame library that applies fade-in and fade-out effects to Surface objects.
body:
### Fade easily!
With this open-source library you'll feel inspired to apply fade-in and fade-out effects to all your surfaces.
### Use it by default!
The IFader class loads an image that can be drawn without fading effects. It's really simple!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
